verbs.description: His stance [V: is] igniting confusion on Capitol Hill over a GOP bill that Trump 's allies believed had his support .
[ARG0: His stance] is [V: igniting] [ARG1: confusion on Capitol Hill over a GOP bill that Trump 's allies believed had his support] .
